Nightlight::

"If you like train her you should ask bout to Aerotaur" said 
Nightlightn "Excuse me, I have to know if Windlord and Aerotaur still 
are in cr "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Sarge: The same way I fought my arch enemies as a child. Courage! I 
was wounded to the max, and I still won! This guy had killed 
thousands, but he fell in the end thanks to me. I don't see why 
Trinity couldn't do the same. It's just that you are holding her 
back...
>
